subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In another tough day at Citi Field, the Mets released struggling starter Livan Hernandez, mysteriously benched Gary Sheffield and lost to the Braves despite the return of Billy Wagner.
snippet: In another tough day at Citi Field, the Mets released struggling starter Livan Hernandez, mysteriously benched Gary Sheffield and lost to the Braves despite the return of Billy Wagner.
